name.kanji: ロバート・アキュトロン

description: Robert Accutrone in "OUT OF BLOOM"Good indeed. It is joyous seeing your morale lifted. Most certainly so. But, you lot are mistaken in regards to one thing. The boss of you lot shall be defeated by ours. Therefore, you lot aren't the only ones whose spirits are lifted when their boss fights! Robert Accutrone (ロバート・アキュトロン, Robāto Akyutoron) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "N". Robert has light brown, swept back hair and a full mustache.

media.alt: Robert attacks Shunsui.
Robert manifests a portal so that the Soldat may invade.
Robert places his gun against Ichigo's head.
Robert is engulfed by Yhwach's Auswählen.
Robert uses a Shadow to summon the Soldat.
Robert's Spirit Weapon.
Grimaniel

quotes.quote: Good indeed. It is joyous seeing your morale lifted. Most certainly so. But, you lot are mistaken in regards to one thing. The boss of you lot shall be defeated by ours. Therefore, you lot aren't the only ones whose spirits are lifted when their boss fights!

Do you not see?! It is all over for us! We have been judged to be unnecessary in the battles to come! I would not expect newcomers like yourselves to understand! To know how terrifying His Majesty can be! The Sternritter exist for His Majesty's sake! His Majesty does not care for lies. There can be no doubt in our purpose. Those Sternritter deemed to be unnecessary will become fuel for His Majesty's

name.kanji: リジェ・バロ, Rije Baro) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "X" - "The X-Axis", as well as the leader of Yhwach's Schutzstaffel (親衛隊 (シュッツシュタッフェル), Shuttsushutafferu; German for "Protective Echelon"

description: Lille Barro in BABY,HOLD YOUR HANDI am immortal. I am invincible. I am an envoy of God, with privileges befitting of such. Faced with an envoy of God, there is nothing a sinner can hope to achieve! Lille Barro (リジェ・バロ, Rije Baro) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "X" - "The X-Axis", as well as the leader of Yhwach's Schutzstaffel (親衛隊 (シュッツシュタッフェル), Shuttsushutafferu; German for "Protective Echelon", Japanese for "Elite/Imperial Guards").

media.alt: The design embroidered on Lille's gloves.
Lille is summoned alongside the other Sternritter.
The palace begins to come apart behind Lille.
Nimaiya cuts down Lille with a single slash.
Yhwach revives Lille and Gerard.
Lille and the other Schutzstaffel arrive.
Lille and his fellow Schutzstaffel sit in the palace.
Shunsui appears behind Lille.
Lille dodges a shadow blade from Kageoni.
Lille is attacked by multiple copies of Shunsui.
Lille is suddenly wounded by Shunsui's Bankai.
Lille has his throat cut by the final act of Shunsui's Bankai.
Lille appears behind Nanao.
Nanao emerges from a shadow on Lille's face.
Nanao severs Lille's hand with Shinken Hakkyōken.
Lille disintegrates.
Nimaiya, a member of the Royal Guard, has multiple holes put into him by The X-Axis.
Lille's Spirit Weapon.
Lille's Quincy: Vollständig, Jilliel.
Lille teleports inside a building.
The second form of Jilliel.
Lille generates a ball of light.
Lille's clones, confronted by Izuru.
Promotional art of Lille in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: The losing side in a battle is always slow to understand and slow to react. From the moment His Majesty entered this place, the Spirit Palace had already fallen.
It is the way of the world that those creatures which break away from the group are the first to die.

I am the final Quincy upon whom His Majesty bestowed his power. I am his ultimate creation. Closer to God than any other man. For one such as myself to be forced to open his eyes three times is tantamount to heresy.
An envoy of God knows not despair.
Do you believe this fight to be over? Do you think you can kill me? As if the Bankai of a mere Shinigami would be able to take my life!

This is despair, Shunsui Kyōraku. Your weapons could not kill me. Even slicing my head clean off with Reiatsu could not kill me. Sinners such as yourself look on this form and see despair. I am immortal. I am invincible. I am an envoy of God, with privileges befitting of such. Faced with an envoy of God, there is nothing a sinner can hope to achieve!

name.kanji: バンビエッタ・バスターバイン

description: Bambietta Basterbine (バンビエッタ・バスターバイン, Banbietta Basutābain) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "E" - "The Explode". Bambietta is a slender young girl with long, straight, dark brown hair and brown eyes. Her attire is a variation of the Sternritter's typical white uniform, consisting of the order's signature hooded-cloak, a thigh-length trench coat, knee-high boots, a miniskirt, and black stockings with a red trim on her gloves and boots.

media.alt: Bambietta is intercepted by Komamura.
Bambietta vents her frustration on an unsuspecting soldier.
Bambietta confronts Komamura and Shinji with her Quincy: Vollständig.
Bambietta learns of Komamura's temporary immortality.
Bambietta is defeated by Komamura.
Giselle summons Bambietta's corpse.
Bambietta unleashes a barrage of bombs at Giselle's command.
Giselle abuses Bambietta for resisting her.
Bambietta steals Kokujō Tengen Myō'ō.
Bambietta detonates a Medallion with The Explode.
Bambietta's Spirit Weapon.
Bambietta's Quincy: Vollständig.
Promotional art of Bambietta in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Actually, aren't you here a bit too soon? Heroes are meant to show up late, right? It'd be way more exciting if you showed up after I'd laid waste to a good bit of Seireitei.
The whole point of fighting is that you don't want to die! That you'll be killed if you lose! If you throw your life away in battle, where's the point in winning?!!

name.kanji: バザード•ブラック, Bazādo Burakku), more commonly known as Bazz-B (バズビー

description: Bazz-B in "THE LAST 9DAYS"It's a pity you don't have your Bankai right now, really. I would've liked to show you how I can annihilate your Bankai's ice with a single finger. Bazzard Black (バザード•ブラック, Bazādo Burakku), more commonly known as Bazz-B (バズビー, Bazubī), is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter, with the designation "H" - "The Heat".

media.alt: Adult
Child
Bazz-B as a child.
Bazz-B being detained for his anarchist behavior
Bazz-B meets Haschwalth for the first time.
Bazz-B watches as his village burns down.
Yhwach arrives at the scene of Bazz-B's fight with Hubert.
Bazz-B screams in anger after being rejected by Yhwach.
Bazz-B's Reiatsu is detected.
Bazz-B crushes a Shinigami's skull underfoot.
Bazz-B proclaims he will take the throne for himself.
Bazz-B engulfs a group of Shinigami in fire.
Cang Du arrives to finish off Hitsugaya.
Bazz-B appears behind Ichigo.
Renji attacks Bazz-B.
Bazz-B reveals that the Sternritter will help the Shinigami.
Bazz-B clashes with Haschwalth.
Haschwalth slashes Bazz-B across the torso.
Bazz-B has his arm cut off by Haschwalth.
Bazz-B uses The Heat to generate flames.
Burner Finger 1 pierces Hitsugaya.
Bazz-B uses Burner Finger 3.
Bazz-B uses Burning Full Fingers.
Bazz-B displays his considerable speed and strength.
Bazz-B's Spirit Weapon.
Bazz-B's Quincy: Vollständig.
Promotional art of Bazz-B in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Haven't you got anything to say about this bullshit? 'Cause me, I always thought if His Majesty was gonna have a successor, it would be you for sure. I doubt any of the Ritter would've been able to complain if His Majesty had appointed you his successor, so how come you're so calm about this?!

What a goddamn coward. I'm disappointed in you. In that case, I guess you won't mind if I take that position from you! If you've got no problem with some dude coming out of nowhere and taking what ought to be yours, then I'll go and take it for myself!

'Don't let them through', my ass! The invasion's already complete, you idiots! Seireitei is gone! That's it! The end! Is there really any point worrying about whether we 'get through' or not at this stage?!
You ain't gonna leave already, are you? It's not nice to run off somewhere else when we're still just getting warmed up! You haven't even let me start fighting for real yet!

A wall of ice made of intricately interwoven strands, huh? You're a thinker, I'll give you that. But there's something you need to learn. No matter what you do with that ice of yours, one finger is all it takes.
How many times do I have to tell you I can crush your ice with one finger?! Or are you just trying to piss me off enough that I'll start using two?!
The hell's with that. You tell me to leave the guy to you, then you go and get your ass kicked? Man, that's lame.
I don't want to hear any complaints from you. Glorious kills are meant to be stolen, and stealing kills is the prerogative of the last guy to show up.

Did you just say 'chicken'? Oh, you had better not be talking shit about my super-stylish, ultra-cool mohican! You're SO dead! I thought you might have decent taste with those super-classy eyebrows you've got, but it looks like I was mistaken!

I'm not asking you to trust me. Or that I'm gonna just help you for nothing. I want something in return. We'll help with rebuilding your gate to the Soul King Palace. In return, I want you to take us there. We want to murder that asshole Yhwach who left us for dead.
I'm not doing this whole hunting thing for food, anyway. I'm a genius, remember? I just hunt to show everyone how awesome I am.
Jugo. Starting today, you're my follower. Don't worry about what the grown-ups say. I'll teach you anything you need to know. Let's become the ultimate Quincies, Jugo.

I felt sure that partnering myself with Jugo would bring no merit whatsoever in my quest to kill Yhwach. And yet, as I watched him devoting his heart and soul to the sword and the bow, working even harder than me, as if to make up for his utter lack of talent, I simply couldn't bring myself to abandon him.
You beat me, Jugo. Dammit...things never quite go how you expect, do they? I always thought I'd be more frustrated when you finally beat me.

name.kanji: ドリスコール・ベルチ

description: Driscoll Berci in "OUT OF BLOOM"Wheeeeeewwww! This sucks! It sucks, it sucks, it sucks, it sucks, it sucks, it sucks, it sucks sooooo bad! It sucks so bad to be weak, ain't that right, Lieutenant! Driscoll Berci (ドリスコール・ベルチ, Dorisukōru Beruchi) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "O" - "The Overkill".

media.alt: Chōjirō is impaled by one of Driscoll's arrows.
Driscoll faces Yamamoto.
Driscoll is killed.
Driscoll's Medallion.
Driscoll's Reishi Tekkō.
Driscoll forms and throws a javelin-like Heilig Pfeil.

quotes.quote: Wheeeeeewwww! This sucks! It sucks, it sucks, it sucks, it sucks, it sucks, it sucks, it sucks sooooo bad! It sucks so bad to be weak, ain't that right, Lieutenant!

name.kanji: ベー・ゲー・ノイン

description: BG9 in "THE LAST 9DAYS"Life? I had none to begin with. BG9 (ベー・ゲー・ノイン, Bē Gē Noin) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "K". BG9 is a tall individual who wears a white helmet which conceals its entire head and its single, glowing eye. At its front, the helmet has a peak at the center with slits on both sides. BG9 wears a white, high collar cloak, under which it hides many extendable, tendril-like appendages.

media.alt: BG9 uncloaked.
BG9's minigun is damaged.
BG9 attempts to gather data from Suì-Fēng's body.
BG9 and Cang sit before Yhwach.
BG9's Spirit Weapon.

quotes.quote: This is a relative of yours, correct? I do not require verbal confirmation. Though the visual conformity between yourselves is extremely low, the Reiatsu conformity exceeds levels of 50%. Furthermore, I detect three other individuals with Reiatsu conformity exceeding 50% with your own within a 30 meter radius of this location. If you refuse to answer again, I will eliminate all of these targets immediately.

I have two queries. Firstly, should I take your response as a refusal to answer? And secondly, if I release this individual now, large quantities of bodily fluid will be expelled from the wound, resulting in death. Is this acceptable to you? There is a possibility that your linguistic faculties have ceased to correctly function due to shock. I will grant you 15 seconds. I await your answer.
Life? I had none to begin with.
Mukyū Shunkō. I must thank you for the valuable data. However, I am also quite disappointed. If this is the best you can do, I will have no need of the Bankai I stole from you.
Even after your captain is defeated, you have the will to resist? I was hoping to recover some data before she perished completely, but if we must...
Wait a moment, please! Yes, we suffered a temporary defeat in battle, but by releasing our Vollständig, we were able to recover! We can still fight for Your Majesty's sake!

name.kanji: キャンディス・キャットニップ

description: Candice Catnipp in "The Headless Star"All I know is that this guy just covered me in dirt...and that he's not getting away with it! How the hell many hours earlier than everyone else d'you think I have to get up every day to make sure my hair is perfect, eh?! Candice Catnipp (キャンディス・キャットニップ, Kyandisu Kyattonippu) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "T" - The Thunderbolt. Candice is a tall and well-endowed young woman with long, light-green hair.

media.alt: Candice is interrupted by Bambietta blasting a hole in the wall.
Candice notices her Quincy: Vollständig wings popped out.
Zaraki attacks Candice.
Candice attacks Ichigo.
Candice clashes with Ichigo.
Candice loses an arm.
Candice uses The Thunderbolt.
Candice's bow.
Candice's Quincy: Vollständig.
Promotional art of Candice in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: All I know is that this guy just covered me in dirt...and that he's not getting away with it! How the hell many hours earlier than everyone else d'you think I have to get up every day to make sure my hair is perfect, eh?!

name.kanji: シャズ・ドミノ

description: Shaz Domino (シャズ・ドミノ, Shazu Domino) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter army. Shaz is a slender man with blonde hair shaved into 5 parts. He has a number of markings similar to leopard spots on the right side of his face and wears full-framed glasses. His attire is the orders signature hooded-cloak, a variation of the Sternritter's typical white uniform with several buttons along his cuffs and pants, and coattails underneath a yellow leopard print vest.

media.alt: Shaz is attacked.
Shaz's Spirit Weapon.

name.kanji: 蒼都 (ツァン·トゥ)

description: Cang Du in "HEART OF WOLF"Those who spend their lives together should remain together in death. Cang Du (蒼都 (ツァン·トゥ), Tsan Tu) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "I" - "The Iron". Cang is a fairly slim man with narrow pale-blue eyes and short black hair, with pointed bangs hanging between his eyes. He has a small, vertical scar over the left side of his mouth.

media.alt: Zanka no Tachi causes the stolen Daiguren Hyōrinmaru to evaporate.
Cang claims the final blow on Hitsugaya.
The stolen Daiguren Hyōrinmaru falls apart.
Hitsugaya encases Cang in a large cross of ice.
BG9 and Cang sit before Yhwach after being rescued from their battles.
Cang's medallion steals Daiguren Hyōrinmaru.
Cang uses The Iron to protect himself from Tōshirō Hitsugaya's blade.
Cang's Spirit Weapon.

quotes.quote: Those who spend their lives together should remain together in death. That is my belief.
This is your Bankai. Doubtless, you have never had the opportunity to see it from this perspective before. It is quite a beautiful Bankai. And of course... This Bankai too is
I'm not a believer in pantheism.
I will not be slain by any hand but His Majesty's!
Cang Du is one of the few Quincy who wears flat shoes.

name.kanji: ベレニケ・ガブリエリ

description: Berenice Gabrielli (ベレニケ・ガブリエリ, Berenike Gaburieri) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "Q" - "The Question". Berenice is a relatively slender individual. Their hair is mostly short and pink, but the right side of their bangs are longer and purple. Their fingernails are painted and each bear a dark diagonal line.

media.alt: Berenice is killed by Kenpachi Zaraki.

quotes.quote: The Question! Kenpachi Zaraki, I object to everything about you! For those who have been called out and objected to by me... should those who are objected to, are obligated to answer my objections! To you, who lacks wisdom, do you realise how dangerous this is? It is impossible for you to understand. Therefore! There is no other way than to know yourself! I know about you, Kenpachi Zaraki, the embodiment of murderous intent. In that case, first and foremost, towards your very essence of murderous intent... I will raise an objection. Now! The first objection, Kenpachi Zaraki! Your murderous intent-

name.kanji: ジゼル・ジュエル

description: Giselle Gewelle (ジゼル・ジュエル, Jizeru Jueru) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "Z" - "The Zombie". Giselle has blue eyes and long, black hair extending down to her lower back, with two strands sticking up like antennae. Her attire is a variation of the Sternritter's typical white uniform, consisting of a trench coat with long sleeves, white shoes, and black leggings.

media.alt: Candice is interrupted by Bambietta blasting a hole in the wall.
Candice, Liltotto, Giselle, and Meninas stand over Bambietta.
The female Sternritter arrive.
Giselle summons Bambietta's corpse.
Giselle summons several zombified Shinigami.
Giselle reattaches Bambietta's arm.
Kensei stabs Giselle through the heart.
Giselle beats Bambietta for attempting to stop her.
Giselle lies defeated at the hand of Yhwach.
Giselle withstands a grievous injury with the healing aspect of The Zombie.
Giselle's bow.
Giselle's Quincy: Vollständig.

quotes.quote: It was pretty tough, you know? Turning Bambi-chan into a zombie. With fellow Quincy, I can't do it until they're already dead, so I actually had to finish her off myself! I remember Bambi-chan's face when I did it. That face...made me so wet...

name.kanji: ジェローム・ギズバット

description: Jerome Guizbatt (ジェローム・ギズバット, Jerōmu Gizubatto) is a Quincy and member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "R" - "The Roar". Jerome is far larger and more muscular than the average person, with brown skin and black hair arranged into cornrows. He exhibits numerous ape-like characteristics, possessing pronounced upper-canines, sharpened fingernails, and patches of dark hair along his forearms and fingers.

media.alt: Jerome while alive.
Kenpachi bisects Jerome.
Jerome utilizes The Roar.

name.kanji: ユーグラム・ハッシュヴァルト, Yūguramu Hasshuvaruto) is a Quincy and the Wandenreich's Sternritter Grandmaster (星十字騎士団最高位 (シュテルンリッター・グランドマスター)
name.romaji: Shuterunrittā Gurandomasutā; Japanese for "Highest-Ranked of the Band of Star-Cross Knights"

description: Jugram Haschwalth (ユーグラム・ハッシュヴァルト, Yūguramu Hasshuvaruto) is a Quincy and the Wandenreich's Sternritter Grandmaster (星十字騎士団最高位 (シュテルンリッター・グランドマスター), Shuterunrittā Gurandomasutā; Japanese for "Highest-Ranked of the Band of Star-Cross Knights") with the designation "B" - "The Balance". He is also the advisor to Emperor Yhwach and the substitute as the monarch when Yhwach sleeps, as well as the second-in-command of the Wandenreich.

Professional Status.occupation: Sternritter Grandmaster[2]Adviser to Emperor[2]Substitute Emperor of Wandenreich

media.alt: Adult
Child
Haschwalth meets Bazz-B for the first time.
Yhwach selects Haschwalth to be his right-hand man.
Yhwach reveals that Haschwalth shares his powers.
Hubert asks Haschwalth if he should teach Bazz-B a lesson.

Haschwalth cuts down Hidetomo.
Haschwalth watches as Kenpachi's unconscious body is held aloft.
Yhwach stops Haschwalth.

Haschwalth is stopped by a barrier.

Haschwalth asks Cang if he can see the tilted scales.

Haschwalth receives all of Uryū's wounds due to the latter's Antithesis.
Haschwalth is struck by the Auswählen.
Haschwalth tells Uryū to save his friends.
Haschwalth's sword.
Haschwalth with The Almighty activated.
Haschwalth creates a shadow portal.
Haschwalth hones his swordsmanship.
Haschwalth's Freund Schild.
Promotional art of Haschwalth in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Have you not noticed? Your fear is so great that rather than see this for the matter of life and death it is, you have subconsciously chosen to refer to it as a matter of 'passage'. A foolish notion. This war has already begun.
His Majesty's will is all that matters. It is not my place to dispute his decision.

This is His Majesty's will. Announcing his successor in that way was certain to cause excessive unrest within the ranks. I cannot imagine His Majesty would fail to foresee this. In which case, there can only be one conclusion. This unrest was caused by His Majesty deliberately. Unrest forces people to keep a close eye on one another. And what is more, all of those eyes will be keenly focused upon Uryū Ishida. No matter who that man may be, no matter what power he may possess, or what views he may hold, with this announcement, he is no longer able to take any action whatsoever. No path remains for that man now but to devote himself utterly to serving His Majesty. He has no other choice. Even if he sees through to His Majesty's true intentions, that will change nothing now.

My dear, you should not have settled for simply developing this technique to completion. You should have refined it to the point that anyone would be able to use it. Had you done so, perhaps your Captains at least would have been able to die in battle, rather than being summarily executed.
It seems the scales of battle are evenly balanced at present. Were they not, there would be no reason for me to come here. My duty here is to tip those scales in our favor.

The joints between the plates are clearly weaker than any point in your last barrier. But since that weakness is so obvious, it can only mean a trap lurks within. I suppose there is nothing for it. It would not be beneficial for me to wait any longer. I will have to resort to less subtle measures.
Lives that were saved by good fortune must be swept aside by equal ill fortune.
I see. How wonderful. This is your second good fortune. Can you see them? The scales of battle, tipping?
His Majesty and I are two sides of a balanced scale. While His Majesty returns to being the Father of the Quincy, I take up the mask of the ruler in his stead. His Majesty and I are connected.

What is that look in your eyes? Do you regret your actions? It is too late for that. I daresay you accepted our invitation in the hope of avenging your mother's death. But there is no longer any way for you to turn back. All who have been granted a piece of His Majesty's soul have their power absorbed by His Majesty upon their deaths. And what is more, in the earlier battle, His Majesty has already scattered fragments of his own soul across all of Seireitei. This battle is a battle for His Majesty. Not only we of the Sternritter, but also any Shinigami who have come into contact with His Majesty's soul will give up their own souls as offerings to His Majesty upon their deaths. No matter who perishes in this battle, it will only serve to bolster His Majesty's strength and to extend His Majesty’s life. To His Majesty, battle is life itself. If he does not continue to absorb souls, eventually, he will return to the body he once had, unable to see, to hear, or even to move. His Majesty will never cease to do battle. There can be no escape. Both you and I must live for His Majesty and die for His Majesty.

Every man walks atop the scales that measure him. All things that he encounters as he lives his life, he must place upon the scales of right and wrong as he goes. As he determines what he believes to be right and what wrong, those fragments of right and wrong are woven together into the shape of a man. That shape becomes the man himself.

You said it yourself. You put everything you have on those scales of yours. Because if you merely followed others, while being lost and adrift yourself... without ever truly weighing your decisions and consequences...then you just may come to regret everything.

Even if it doesn't alter or change the end result even in the slightest...making decisions based on convictions that you believe in...and walking your own path has its own merit and worth. There's something to be said for not having...even one regret.

name.kanji: 石田 依澄

description: Izumi Ishida in "EVERYTHING BUT THE RAIN"Lying does not befit a lady. Izumi Ishida (石田 依澄, Ishida Izumi) was an Echt Quincy as well as the wife of Sōken Ishida, the mother of Ryūken Ishida, and the grandmother of Uryū Ishida. Izumi was a black-haired woman with short hair. She wore a cardigan along with a inner-shirt and long skirt or a maxi dress. She had a scar on her lower calf of the left leg. Izumi was a stern woman, who took her responsibilities as matriarch of the Ishida family seriously.

quotes.quote: Are you not fully aware of your position?! With the previous generation passed away and no siblings to your name you are the sole remaining member of the Kurosaki clan!! It is out of concern for a fellow Quincy that I have taken you in!!
Izumi was left unnamed in the original manga chapters. Her name was only revealed in the anime adaptation of the Thousand-Year Blood War arc.

name.kanji: 石田竜弦

description: Ryūken Ishida (石田竜弦, Ishida Ryūken) is an Echt Quincy who is the son of Sōken Ishida and father of Uryū Ishida. He is the Director of the Karakura Hospital and also known as 'The Last Quincy'; a title contested by his son. Ryūken Ishida is a middle-aged man of average height and appears quite fit for his age. He normally wears thin, frameless glasses and a plain grey suit with a light blue shirt and a tie adorned with Quincy crosses. He has narrow blue eyes, and is fair-skinned with white hair.

media.alt: Adult
Youth
Isshin, Urahara, and Ryūken meet for the first time.
Ryūken demands Urahara to save Masaki.
Ryūken autopsies his dead wife.
Ryūken trains Uryū to restore his son's Quincy powers.
Isshin and Ryūken discussing smoking.
Ryūken offers to take Orihime home.
Ryūken warns Ichigo not to pursue Tsukishima.
Ryūken and Isshin arrive at Wahrwelt.
Ryūken's Quincy Cross, in the form of a Pentacle.
The silver arrowhead.
Ryūken's newest bow.
Ryūken hosting the Quincy Encyclopedia.
Promotional art of Ryūken wielding his Heilig Bogen in Bleach: Brave Souls.
Promotional art of a young Ryūken wielding his Heilig Bogen.

quotes.quote: How many times do I have to tell you, there is no point in saving the dead. That's a Shinigami's job. You should learn how to save the people who are alive. I have no interest in it and you have no talent in it. The Quincy will become extinct with your grandfather's generation, understand?
Because you can't make a living from it.
quotes.to: Uryū Ishida, when asked why he hates being a Quincy

quotes.quote: I have restored his Quincy powers. It is up to him whether they live or die. As well as whether he lives or dies.

name.kanji: 石田 宗弦

description: Sōken Ishida (石田 宗弦, Ishida Sōken) was an Echt Quincy as well as the father of Ryūken Ishida and the grandfather of Uryū Ishida. Sōken is an elderly man with gray hair, a gray mustache and glasses. His eyes were deep gray and he had a bit of a beard of his chin. His skin was wrinkled with age and he had pronounced cheekbones. He wears white Quincy clothes underneath a brown tunic. Sōken was a kind man whom Uryū admired.

media.alt: Sōken's Quincy Bow.

quotes.quote: Be it Human or Shinigami, seeing a sad face is unbearable to me.
A heart of vengeance forges the soul firm with resolve, but if one is not careful, vengeance can be blinded by obstinacy and pride, thereby dulling the blade.

The Quincy's arrows are released in the name of Justice. In other words, justice is when you have something that must be protected. There is nothing more difficult than the basics that I have just taught you. From there on, it depends on your heart. In the name of justice, Quincy release the arrows from their hearts.

name.kanji: 石田 雨竜, Ishida Uryū) is a Gemischt Quincy residing in Karakura Town. He is a doctor at Karakura Hospital, and a friend of Ichigo Kurosaki. He is a former member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "A" - "Antithesis", formerly one of Yhwach's Schutzstaffel (親衛隊 (シュッツシュタッフェル), Shuttsushutafferu; German for "Protective Echelon"

description: Uryū Ishida (石田 雨竜, Ishida Uryū) is a Gemischt Quincy residing in Karakura Town. He is a doctor at Karakura Hospital, and a friend of Ichigo Kurosaki. He is a former member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "A" - "Antithesis", formerly one of Yhwach's Schutzstaffel (親衛隊 (シュッツシュタッフェル), Shuttsushutafferu; German for "Protective Echelon", Japanese for "Elite/Imperial Guards"), and was once designated as his future successor.

Uryū is incapacitated by Haschwalth.
Haschwalth prepares to kill Uryū.
Uryū receives an arrowhead made of Still Silver from his father.
Uryū eats in the background of Keigo's ramen shop.

Uryū during his time in Hueco Mundo.
Uryū after regaining his Quincy powers.
Uryū using the Quincy: Letzt Stil.
Uryū as he appears in Bleach: Spirits Are Forever With You.
An alternate-universe Uryū who has further mastered his Quincy powers.
Uryū's missing hand in the manga and injured arm in the anime, as a result of his fight with Ulquiorra Cifer.

quotes.quote: You want an attack full of
Sensei, I want to get stronger. I'll become a very strong Quincy and then protect everyone from Hollows. Then father will definitely agree with the way of the Quincy.
I swear on the pride of the Quincy, I will kill you.
Apologize to everyone and never appear in front of me again, then I will spare your life. If you don't, I will shoot you again with three times as much power as the last shot.

She knows that if she tries to help, she'll just be in the way. Plus, even if she is able to help Kurosaki wouldn't want her to. She knows all of this, but she is still clenching her whole body, as if trying to stop it from taking action. Inoue is waiting, praying that you will be safe, believing you will return. Don't lose Kurosaki. If you lose, I will never forgive you!
quotes.to: Thinking during the fight between Ichigo and Byakuya

quotes.quote: You're asking if this is a bow? Of course it is. You think I would use anything else?
I have not exterminated you so that you can relay a message to Aizen. Tell him the Quincy are here, and that in reality, it's not the Shinigami he should fear, but rather the Quincy!

The right to choose life or death lies with the victor, and the victor of this battle is me. From her perspective, my leaving her alive here might seem like an insult, but I have no intention of doing things their way.
I am. That's why I'm ready to do battle with you!
quotes.to: Ulquiorra Cifer regarding Uryū being clear-headed

quotes.quote: You think I...am similar to Ichigo and the others? All this time, I have always stayed calm and collected... balancing each decision on the scales that you speak of... but Ichigo is a fool, so he can't do that. When he wants to save someone, he goes to save them. Orihime-san is a fool too, and Sado is a fool. Rukia is a fool, and Abarai is a fool. If I seem to you in any way similar to that bunch of fools...that makes me very happy.

name.kanji: 片桐 叶絵

description: Kanae Katagiri (片桐 叶絵, Katagiri Kanae) was a Gemischt Quincy and a former maid in the service of the Ishida family. She later became the wife of Ryūken Ishida and the mother of Uryū Ishida. Katagiri is a black-haired woman with a large hair bun. While in the service of the Ishida family, she wore an old-fashioned maid outfit. Several years after Uryū was born, she wore her hair down, and instead donned a white dress shirt and black bottom.

media.alt: Katagiri with a young Uryū.
Katagiri and Ryūken meet for the first time.
Katagiri as envisioned by the Bleach anime.

quotes.quote: Ryūken-sama. Have you forgotten? It is my sworn duty to dedicate my entire life to serving you. From the day we first set eyes on one another, my life has belonged to you. So, please... Please... do not be sad. If you feel sorrow, Ryūken-sama, my heart will be torn apart.

name.kanji: 黒崎 真咲

description: Masaki Kurosaki (黒崎 真咲, Kurosaki Masaki) was an Echt Quincy, the wife of Isshin Kurosaki, and mother of Ichigo Kurosaki, Karin Kurosaki, and Yuzu Kurosaki. She was the last surviving member of her family, and was taken in by the Ishida family before an incident with a Hollow led her to live a life with Isshin. Masaki was a woman of average height.

media.alt: Adult
Youth
Masaki comes to Isshin's aid.
A Hollow Hole forming on Masaki's chest.
Isshin catches Masaki, banishing the Hollow presence.
Masaki caring for Ichigo when he was just a toddler.
Masaki with her family.
Masaki lies dead.
Masaki's Blut Vene.
Masaki's handheld Heilig Bogen.
Promotional art of Masaki wielding her Heilig Bogen in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: I understand how you're always thinking about your mother and the Quincy as a whole. Always considering what's best for the future, taking into account all the consequences of your actions. And I honestly admire the way you're able to do that. But you see, I'm not you, Ryuu-chan. To me,

name.kanji: リルトット・ランパード

description: Liltotto Lamperd (リルトット・ランパード, Rirutotto Ranpādo) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "G" - "The Glutton". Liltotto is a petite young girl with chin-length blonde hair and purple eyes.

media.alt: Liltotto and the group approach Bambietta.
The female Sternritter arrive.
Meninas uses The Power to attack Liltotto.
Liltotto confronts PePe.
Robert confronts Liltotto.
Liltotto and the other Sternritter help construct the doorway.
Liltotto is easily defeated by Yhwach.
Liltotto uses The Glutton.
Liltotto fires a Heilig Pfeil with her bow.
Liltotto activating her Quincy: Vollständig.

name.kanji: グエナエル・リー

description: Guenael Lee (グエナエル・リー, Guenaeru Rī) is a creation of Gremmy Thoumeaux's The Visionary ability, originally thought to be a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "V - Vanishing Point". Guenael is a short, elderly-looking man who has big, pink hair. His lips do not fully close, exposing large teeth. His legs appear to be disproportionately short to his torso. He wears glasses and has a lazy right eye. He wears a head adornment which is attached to four points on his face.

media.alt: Guenael appears behind Isane.
Guenael attempts to stab Yachiru.
Guenael uses Vanishing Point.

quotes.quote: I don’t know how many times I’m going to have to say this before we’re done... but let me just say, it’s a pleasure to make your acquaintance. I am Sternritter “V”... Guenael Lee the “Vanishing Point”. And I’m afraid... you will not be able... to see... feel... or even... remember... my existence.

The heck is that?! You call that a reason?! That’s not a reason!! I see... It’s instinct... Her instincts drove her to attack me... My attacks up until now, though gone from her conscious memory, must have left a mark on her instincts... Come to think of it, the color of her hair is rather more wild than befits a young lady... And there’s an untamed look to her face, like a savage monkey... What a beast of a girl! I must finish this hunt before she truly awakens her animal instincts!

name.kanji: "Lの" ロイド・ロイド

description: Loyd Lloyd ("Lの" ロイド・ロイド, Eru no Roido Roido) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "Y" - "The Yourself". He is the older identical twin brother of Royd Lloyd. Loyd is a tall and rather slender individual. His head is completely bald, and features a third eye at the center of his forehead. Each of his ears is encased by a circular, headphone-like covering which is surrounded by a dark-colored trim.

media.alt: Young
Kenpachi carries the corpses of Loyd, Berenice, and Jerome on his shoulders.
Loyd transforms into Kenpachi.

name.kanji: "Rの" ロイド・ロイド

description: Royd Lloyd in "THE FIRE"You say...I have...done...well? It is...an...honor... Royd Lloyd ("Rの" ロイド・ロイド, Aru no Roido Roido) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "Y" - "The Yourself". He is the younger identical twin brother of Loyd Lloyd. Royd is a tall and rather slender individual, whose head is completely bald and features a third eye at the center of his forehead.

media.alt: Young
Royd holds up a defeated Kenpachi by the throat.
Royd tells Haschwalth to not underestimate Zanka no Tachi.
Yamamoto strikes Royd.
Royd attempts to attack with his Heilig Pfeil.
Royd is swarmed by the skeletons.
Royd is dealt fatal wounds.
Royd using Blut Vene.
Yhwach's Spirit Weapon, wielded by Royd.

quotes.quote: You say...I have...done...well? It is...an...honor...
only

name.kanji: マスク・ド・マスキュリン

description: Mask De Masculine (マスク・ド・マスキュリン, Masuku Do Masukyurin) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "S" - "The Superstar". Mask has a very large, muscular build. He wears the standard Sternritter uniform, with the addition of a yellow and red-orange luchador mask covering most of his head and face, leaving his chin and nose exposed. His mask has a star pattern on the forehead and thick markings around his eyes, nose and cheeks. His boots and gloves are red.

media.alt: Mask ambushes Renji Abarai.
Mask asks Bazz-B where he is going.
Mask destroys his eardrums to negate Rose's Bankai.
Renji slices Mask across the abdomen.
Renji incinerates Mask with Sōō Zabimaru, Zaga Teppō.
Mask's powered-up form.
Mask's Quincy: Vollständig.

quotes.quote: Even victory feels a little empty when there's no audience around to watch, eh, James?!
The cheers of my fans are all the strength I need!
You fiend! Only a coward would harm an innocent fan!
quotes.to: Rōjūrō Ōtoribashi after he bifurcates James

quotes.quote: What's this? You're not going to take me on two-on-one? The captains I just defeated faced me both at once, dirty cowards as they were! But villains are dirty and underhanded by nature, so I will not hold it against you if you follow their example!

So you evaded my fabulous attack and even landed an elbow strike. It seems that luck, at least, is on your side. But you have made one crucial mistake. With that attack, you have earned the wrath of a star! Now behold! This star seal appears on my fist when I feel true rage! This is the sign of a true star, bound to crush all evil!
A star cannot fall at the hands of a villain!
You are the villain who I sent flying before with my Star Drop Kick, are you not? A superstar cannot afford to remember every last villain he defeats, so I had forgotten until this moment!
Before this Superstar with the splendor of a god, you will turn to dust and die without ever touching the ground!
Worry not, James! A star and his fans are joined at the heart! As long as I live, you will be reborn!

Very dangerous, villain. That Bankai is dangerous. To think that it could block the greatest attack in this star's arsenal...truly, I cannot allow you to live! My heart has now begun to blaze with furious flames - flames of justice, that will not rest until you lie defeated!

Damn you to hell, you piece of shit! How dare you break the left arm of a star?! I won't forgive you for that, you pathetic piece of scum! Forget justice, forget evil, I don't care about that crap! I'm gonna murder you!

name.kanji: ミニーニャ・マカロン

description: Meninas McAllon (ミニーニャ・マカロン, Minīnya Makaron) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "P" - "The Power". Meninas is a tall and well-endowed girl of slender build. She is light-skinned with long wavy pink hair and short bangs that frame her forehead and green eyes.

media.alt: Meninas bids Rukia Kuchiki farewell as she enters a Shadow.
Meninas and the group approach Bambietta.
The female Sternritter arrive.
Meninas carries a large building into the air.
Meninas attacks Ichigo by driving him through a building.
Meninas is hit by PePe's The Love.
Meninas uses The Power.
Meninas' bow.
Meninas activating her Quincy: Vollständig.

quotes.quote: Are you turning your back towards the enemy during battle? I feel insulted.

name.kanji: ナナナ・ナジャークープ

description: NaNaNa Najahkoop in "MARCH OF THE STARCROSS"Sorry, man. I don't get any of this art stuff. But don't worry. You and that V-whatever of yours won't ever find the time to cry. 'Cause in five minutes' time, you're gonna be dead. NaNaNa Najahkoop (ナナナ・ナジャークープ, NaNaNa Najākūpu) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "U" - The Underbelly.

media.alt: Rose threatens to kill NaNaNa.
NaNaNa ambushes Yamamoto.
NaNaNa, PePe, and Robert appear behind Bazz-B.
NaNaNa is shot through the chest.
The Underbelly is used on Aizen.

quotes.quote: Sorry, man. I don't get any of this art stuff. But don't worry. You and that V-whatever of yours won't ever find the time to cry. 'Cause in five minutes' time, you're gonna be dead.

What a moron. He really was fast asleep... I came here to see what kind of guy had taken out Mask De Masculine, and I found this guy snoring away without a care in the world. I figured it must be some kind of trap, so I monitored him carefully. But he seriously stayed asleep right until morning. Who could've guessed a guy would actually go to sleep right in the middle of enemy territory? Even so, his luck's run out now. This is the first time I've ever

name.kanji: アスキン・ナックルヴァール, Asukin Nakkuruvāru) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "D" - "The Deathdealing", as well as one of Yhwach's Schutzstaffel (親衛隊 (シュッツシュタッフェル), Shuttsushutafferu; German for "Protective Echelon"

description: Askin Nakk Le Vaar (アスキン・ナックルヴァール, Asukin Nakkuruvāru) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "D" - "The Deathdealing", as well as one of Yhwach's Schutzstaffel (親衛隊 (シュッツシュタッフェル), Shuttsushutafferu; German for "Protective Echelon", Japanese for "Elite/Imperial Guards"). Askin has medium length black hair with white streaks, with a strand hanging down in front of his face, reaching his mouth.

media.alt: Askin explains why he stopped the fight.
Askin notices the invisible room behind him.
Askin appears alongside the other Schutzstaffel.
Nimaiya defeats Askin with a single attack.
Askin and his fellow Schutzstaffel sit in the palace.
Askin flees from Grimmjow.
Askin and Ichigo experience the effects of Shunsui's Bankai.
Yoruichi confronts Askin.
Askin survives Yūshirō's attack.
Askin shoots Yūshirō with three arrows.
Askin corners Yoruichi.
Askin faces off against Yoruichi's new form.
Urahara attacks Askin.
Askin is impaled by Grimmjow.
Askin reveals that his Gift Ball Deluxe will kill Urahara and Grimmjow as he dies.
Askin incapacitates Ichigo with The Deathdealing.
Askin's Spirit Weapon.
Askin's Quincy: Vollständig, Hasshein.
Promotional art of Askin in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: I would advise you both to let this matter lie. There is nothing pleasant about such petty fighting. For you in particular, it will be nothing but a poison. Would you not agree, Future Emperor?

Weren't you listening to my explanation? I would have thought a place called the Research and Development Institute would be home to a little more intelligence. I didn't need to 'get inside' at all. I've been in here from the very beginning.

Nope, no good! Dealing with you is just gonna take way too much time. I'd better not bother. I mean if I was gonna make you die, I reckon I'd have to try out way too many different tactics. Sorry, but I'm just awful with that kind of finicky stuff. I like to get things over with in a flash, y'know?

Society always looks down on those people who spend all their time dreaming and don't actually achieve anything, but then you look at a guy who can achieve anything he likes just by dreaming, and you think, hey, maybe it's not such a bad thing that most dreams don't come true.

The reason His Majesty took me in was quite simple. It’s because I just wouldn’t die. A bit of a pathetic ability, right...? I hate it, myself. Just thinking about this ability of mine makes me feel so fatally irritated.

You took me lightly, didn't you? The way I speak, the way I act... I seem like a worthless underling, even I know it. But you know, I don't think I really mind. It used to bug me something awful, but lately, I've come around to thinking that it's actually one of my good points. That's what I tell myself, anyway. Think I'm gloomy, do ya? Well, that's just what's so fatal about me.
How about we quit talking about things in terms of winners and losers? I'm not good with that kind of thing.

Haven't you ever heard of a thing called delicacy? It's about defeating my enemies in my own style. My style of fighting is to rely entirely upon lethal doses. Walking up and strangling people sounds like a job better left to ladies like yourself and Bambi.
I won't deny that both you and Bambi are attractive... But a woman's worth isn't in her face... It's in her fashion sense!
Oh? You looking for a fight, little lady? Just to warn you, even if you're unarmed, I'll still use my bow.

Hold it! You're probably thinking you can beat my strategy by making her Reiatsu change itself even further, but that's no use. I wouldn't want you to go to all that trouble for nothing, so I'm gonna be nice and tell you about my Vollständig's ability.
Now look, I'm not a fan of all this shit-talking stuff. Saying harsh things all the time just give the impression you’re not confident, y'know? And I prefer to stay as calm and collected as can be.

It's true that loyalty isn't everything to me. I just have a personal interest in His Majesty. Does that make it sound like I'm looking down on him? That's not my intention, of course. The Human World. Hueco Mundo. Soul Society. The guy's trying to destroy three whole worlds and create something new in their wake. Is there any other man who can claim that? If I were to let His Majesty get away, do you think I'd ever find another man like that again? Kisuke Urahara. You're a knowledgeable guy. You look like you've seen everything this world has to offer. So I ask you: don't you feel it too? Aren't you curious to see what His Majesty is going to create once he's destroyed three entire worlds?

I'd love to spare you out of respect, but even I can't do anything about this... Neither of you have the strength left to run, do you? I'm real sorry...though I guess, considering who I'm dealing with, you'll probably get out of this somehow, huh? Jeez...wouldn't want to make a fool of myself... So just this once, I won't call this a 'lethal' situation...
quotes.to: Kisuke Urahara and Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez while dying

name.kanji: エス・ノト

description: Äs Nödt (エス・ノト, Esu Noto) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "F" - "The Fear". Äs has long, black hair and dark eyes with visibly light pupils. His attire is a variation of the Sternritter's typical white uniform, consisting of the order's signature hooded cloak, an ankle-length trench coat with many buttons on its front and sleeves, and black boots.

media.alt: Äs is bedridden.
Äs is cut by Byakuya.
Äs unleashes Senbonzakura Kageyoshi against Byakuya.
Äs, NaNaNa, and Bazz-B ambush Yamamoto.
Äs Nödt is frozen.
Äs dies.
Äs uses his medallion to steal Senbonzakura Kageyoshi.
Äs overwhelms Byakuya Kuchiki with The Fear.
Äs demonstrates his Blut Vene by blocking Zabimaru without injury.
Äs' Spirit Weapon.
Äs' Quincy: Vollständig.
Äs Nödt transformed.

quotes.quote: Fear can be overcome through experience. Those who know battle often come to believe this. 'Fear that comes from reason' is kind. It can be conquered through force of will or through experience. It is possible to suppress such reasoned fear by severing it at its source. But true fear is without reason. It is not an emotion, but an instinct. True fear occurs without reason, without bounds. It is like a swarm of insects crawling up the body. We cannot escape from our instincts.

All human beings have things that cause them to feel comfort, and things that cause them to feel fear. When they enter a place that causes them comfort, if questioned as to why they feel comfortable there, they cannot form a clear answer, merely saying things such as 'because I do'. But when they enter a place that causes them fear, even the dullest of fools can identify the causes of that fear. Darkness, cold, height, confinement, pain, contamination. People can list any number of reasons to be afraid. This is because at the most fundamental level, 'comfort' leads to 'life', whilst 'fear' leads to 'death'. While people cannot give a clear answer why they want to live, they can give any number of answers why they do not wish to die. This does not only apply to sentient beings with emotions. It is in the nature of all life to avoid death, and therefore, to avoid 'fear'. All living beings go through life for the purpose of evading fear. It is to better escape fear that they train themselves. It is to better escape fear that they grow and evolve. Thus, it is impossible to be unaffected by fear as long as you are alive.

Fear. The power of fear. Is this the power of fear? NO. This is not fear. This does not even approach fear. My only fear is to be rebuked by His Majesty! To be rebuked by His Majesty and have all of this body taken from me! Compared to such terror, mere battle can hold no fear, no pain, nothing!

I will not kill you. I will not kill you. I will not kill you! Under no circumstances will I bring about your death! I will not allow you to lose consciousness or even your sanity! I will submerge you in an ocean of pain and fear, and cause you to live out an eternity wishing for the bliss of death!

I'm not dead yet. Breathing is such a painful act. To think that it is impossible to live without suffering this pain constantly... Life is such an inconvenient state. I was taught that after death, we either go to heaven or to hell. Perhaps in heaven, it is not painful to breathe. Perhaps in heaven, my body and my head would not ache so. That would be nice. And hell...is there even more pain there than I am feeling right now? If so, that's a little frightening. I don’t want to go there. I'm scared. I'm afraid. I don't want to go to hell.

Your Majesty... I'm scared. Am I going to die? Will I go to hell? Forgive me, Your Majesty. Don't be angry. I'm scared. I don't want any more pain. I'm scared of the pain. I'm scared, so scared, so scared, so scared, so scared, so scared, so afraid. So afr-

name.kanji: キルゲ・オピー, Kiruge Opī) is the executive hunting captain (統括狩猟隊長, tōkatsu shuryō taichō) of the first Jagdarmee of the Wandenreich. He is also a member of the Sternritter with the designation "J" - "The Jail"
name.romaji: and is known as Quilge Opie of "the Jail" ("監獄" (ザ・ジェイル

description: Quilge Opie in "MARCH OF THE STARCROSS"For in the eyes of any twisted and barbaric Shinigami, to face the ultimate enforcers of all that is holy and righteous must be an abhorrent and terrifying sight indeed! Quilge Opie (キルゲ・オピー, Kiruge Opī) is the executive hunting captain (統括狩猟隊長, tōkatsu shuryō taichō) of the first Jagdarmee of the Wandenreich.

media.alt: Quilge stabs an outspoken Arrancar.
Quilge attacks and defeats Loly Aivirrne and Menoly Mallia.
Quilge stands over the defeated Arrancar.
Quilge states his techniques are still faulty.
Quilge appears behind Ichigo.
Quilge's gathered Reishi is shattered.
Quilge states he will kill them all.
Quilge after absorbing Ayon with Sklaverei.
Quilge is cut down.
Quilge traps Ichigo using The Jail.
Quilge continues to fight by using Ransōtengai.
Quilge's Spirit Weapon.
Quilge's Quincy: Vollständig, Biskiel.
Biskiel after assimilating Ayon.

quotes.quote: 'Creepy' you say? Is that what you think... of this form of mine? That is the correct reaction. For in the eyes of any twisted and barbaric Shinigami... To face the ultimate enforcers of all that is holy and righteous... must be an abhorrent and terrifying sight indeed!!!
Each time I witness my victims struggling in vain the same thought occurs to me anew.
My orders from His Majesty are to delay Kurosaki Ichigo... even at the cost of my own life!!
The letter I have been granted by His Majesty is

name.kanji: ペルニダ・パルンカジャス, Perunida Parunkajasu) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "C" - "The Compulsory", as well as one of Yhwach's Schutzstaffel (親衛隊 (シャトズスタフェル), Shatozusutaferu; German for "Protective Echelon"

description: Pernida Parnkgjas in "FRIEND"Shameless? How is claiming to be a Quincy shameless? I... have always been a Quincy. Pernida Parnkgjas (ペルニダ・パルンカジャス, Perunida Parunkajasu) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "C" - "The Compulsory", as well as one of Yhwach's Schutzstaffel (親衛隊 (シャトズスタフェル), Shatozusutaferu; German for "Protective Echelon", Japanese for "Elite/Imperial Guards"). It is also the left hand of the Soul King.

Professional Status.occupation: Left Hand of the Soul King

media.alt: Unhooded Form
Hooded Form
Nimaiya stabs Pernida with Sayafushi.
Pernida and the other Schutzstaffel kneel before Yhwach.
Zaraki cuts partway through Pernida.
Pernida attacks Mayuri.
Pernida has its pinkie blown off.
A modified Konjiki Ashisogi Jizō devours Pernida and its clones.
Pernida creates multiple Heilig Bogens.
Pernida's clone severs its infected thumb.
Pernida's clones devour Nemu's remains.
Pernida's clone remains sentient even while torn to shreds.
The effects of The Compulsory on Zaraki's arm.
Pernida's Heilig Bogen.
Pernida with a hand.

name.kanji: グレミィ・トゥミュー

description: Gremmy Thoumeaux (グレミィ・トゥミュー, Guremī Tumyū) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "V" - "The Visionary". Gremmy has a child-like appearance, with messy blond hair, youthful features, and red eyes. His attire is a variation of the Sternritter's typical white uniform, consisting of a loose trench coat featuring a hood and a high collar. However, this body is only a product of his power. His real vessel is a disembodied brain in a protective casing.

media.alt: Normal Form
True Form
Bloodthirsty Gremmy after having a rival.
Gremmy mercilessly eliminates Guenael.
Gremmy stops Zaraki's blade.
Gremmy creates several dozen firearms around himself.
Unable to contain Zaraki's power, Gremmy's body tears itself apart.
Gremmy and his clone imagine a meteorite.
Promotional art of Gremmy in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: The most powerful force in this world is 'imagination.' Anything I imagine, anything at all, becomes reality.
I am Gremmy

'This kid's ability is like a joke.' That's what you're thinking, right? I'm afraid a fighter like you probably won't be able to fully comprehend my strength until you've already lost. So, shall we begin? Come and try to attack me, Kenpachi Zaraki. I won't insult you by trying to stop you with a single finger. No, I won't even raise any fingers against you. I'll take your life using my mind alone.

What's this? What did he say just now? If I'm the strongest, I must want to take down the strongest? I'd never even considered such a thing. From the very beginning, there was never a single person who posed a threat to me. After all, I never had any doubts. I've always known I'm the strongest of them all. There's no need to prove it by killing other people. So I never felt the need to crush somebody else with my strength. And yet... And yet why is it that right now, I want to crush this man so much?!
I want to win. I want to win, I want to win, I want to win! For the first time in my life, I feel a true desire to win against somebody!
Ahh... I can feel my imagination reaching its limit. It makes me feel a little lonely to imagine that I'm about to enter a world...without any imagination at all...

name.kanji: ジェラルド・ヴァルキリー, Jerarudo Varukirī) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "M" - The Miracle, as well as one of Yhwach's Schutzstaffel (親衛隊 (シュッツシュタッフェル), Shuttsushutafferu; German for "Protective Echelon"

description: Gerard Valkyrie in "BABY,HOLD YOUR HAND"At what point did I say this would be a one-on-one fight? In a fair duel, not even a miracle would allow you to defeat me! Come at me together! Gerard Valkyrie (ジェラルド・ヴァルキリー, Jerarudo Varukirī) is a Quincy and a member of the Wandenreich's Sternritter with the designation "M" - The Miracle, as well as one of Yhwach's Schutzstaffel (親衛隊 (シュッツシュタッフェル), Shuttsushutafferu; German for "Protective Echelon", Japanese for "Elite/Imperial Guards").

Nimaiya defeats Gerard with a single attack.
Yhwach revives Gerard and the other Schutzstaffel with Auswählen.
Gerard and the other Schutzstaffel sit in the palace.
Gerard confronts the remaining Shinigami.
Gerard is knocked back into some rubble by Byakuya and Renji.
Gerard overwhelms the Shinigami.
Gerard repels the Visored.
Gerard is engulfed in ice.

Gerard overwhelms Zaraki.
Zaraki cuts Gerard in half.
Gerard survives being bifurcated and activates his Quincy: Vollständig.
Gerard breaks out of the ice encasing him.
Gerard's entire body reforms.
Gerard is killed by Yhwach's Auswählen.
Gerard regenerates his severed arm and becomes gigantic with The Miracle.
Gerard's wings.
Gerard's Spirit Weapon, Hoffnung.
Gerard's Heilig Bogen.
Gerard's Quincy: Vollständig, Aschetonig.
Gerard's second form.

quotes.quote: A woman’s slender arms cannot hope to halt a strike from my blade!
At what point did I say this would be a one-on-one fight? In a fair duel, not even a miracle would allow you to defeat me! Come at me together!

Do you know when the phenomenon known as a “miracle” occurs? If a miracle were to occur at an ordinary moment nobody would think of it as such. 'Oh, hey.' 'You were pretty lucky there.' 'Strange things do happen.' That’s all they’d think.
So terrifying it must be to be powerless! But do not cry in anguish. For no matter how much you cry out, no miracle will save you!

Alas, it seems that even Captain-level Shinigami of the Gotei 13 are powerless before my miraculous power. Even their Reiatsu is so tiny that I can scarcely sense it. Must I pick them out from among this rubble and kill them one by one with this titanic form? How bothersome. It is attempting to crush ants in the sand. A near-impossible task... but that is precisely why I will not fail! Did you think I would not find you because it is impossible?! Achieving the impossible is what miracles are for!

So, you managed to knock me down. You are quite strong. I do not like doing this, as it seems cruel, but you leave me no choice. Powerful incarnations of darkness such as yourself deserve to be turned to rust on my blade, Hoffnung!

My power is that of miracles! Miracles are the incarnation of the hearts of the people! My great and impenetrable body was enlarged to incredible size by the people's 'fear'. And my blade, 'Hoffnung', is formed from the people's 'hope'. So if it cracks, that can only mean 'despair'!
How indomitable! I admire your spirit! However...mere spirit cannot compensate for the gap in our strength!
I am the biggest, strongest and fastest of all Quincy! A warrior granted every blessing! Did you really expect to outwit me in battle?!
I am 'Aschetonig'. Noble warrior of God. Even in death, I wield this blade for my divine master!
